# preservesRepeatMode

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the chosen repeat mode is preserved between playback sessions.

## Declaration

```swift
var preservesRepeatMode: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

When set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the chosen repeat mode is preserved between playback sessions.

## Changing the repeat type

- **repeatType**: The repeat type used when fulfilling the event request.
